hillbillies.model

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • hillbillies.model.Unit

  • public class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
    A class of units with a current position, a name, weight, strength, agility and toughness.
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    Ruben Cartuyvels
    Invariants:
  • The position of a unit must always be valid, within the game world.
        isValidPosition(getPosition())
  • The name of a unit must always be a valid name.
        isValidName(getName())
  • The weight of a unit must always be a valid weight for that unit.
        canHaveAsWeight(getWeight())
  • The strength of a unit must always be a valid strength.
        isValidStrength(getStrength())
  • The agility of a unit must always be a valid agility.
        isValidAgility(getAgility())
  • The toughness of a unit must always be a valid toughness.
        isValidToughness(getToughness())
  • The current number of hitpoints must always be valid for this unit.
        canHaveAsHitPoints(getCurrentHitPoints())
  • The current number of stamina points must always be valid for this unit.
        canHaveAsStaminaPoints(getCurrentStaminaPoints())
  • The orientation of a unit must always be valid.
        isValidOrientation(getOrientation())

    • Constructor Detail

      • Unit

        @Raw
public Unit(java.lang.String name,
        int[] initialPosition,
        int weight,
        int agility,
        int strength,
        int toughness,
        boolean enableDefaultBehavior)
     throws IllegalPositionException,
            IllegalNameException
        Initialize a new unit with the given attributes.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the unit.
        initialPosition - The initial position of the unit, as an array with 3 elements {x, y, z}.
        weight - The initial weight of the unit
        agility - The initial agility of the unit
        strength - The initial strength of the unit
        toughness - The initial toughness of the unit
        enableDefaultBehavior - Whether the default behavior of the unit is enabled
        Postconditions:
      • the new name of the unit is equal to the given name.
            new.getName() == name
      • the new position of the unit is equal to the given position.
            new.getPosition() == position
      • if the given weight is valid, the new weight will be equal to the given weight.
            if (canHaveAsWeight(weight))
            then new.getWeight() == weight
      • if the given strength is valid, the new strength will be equal to the given strength.
            if (isValidStrength(strength))
            then new.getStrength() == strength
      • if the given agility is valid, the new agility will be equal to the given agility.
            if (isValidAgility(agility))
            then new.getAgility() == agility
      • if the given toughness is valid, the new toughness will be equal to the given toughness.
            if (isValidToughness(toughness))
            then new.getToughness() == toughness
      • The new orientation of the unit is equal to Pi/2.
            new.getOrientation() == Math.PI/2
      • The new current number of hitpoints of the unit is equal to the max number of hitpoints for the unit.
            new.getCurrentHitPoints() == new.getMaxHitPoints()
      • The new current number of stamina points of the unit is equal to the max number of stamina points for the unit.
            new.getCurrentStaminaPoints() == new.getMaxStaminaPoints()
      • The new minimum number of hitpoints of the unit is equal to 0.
            new.getMinHitPoints() == 0
      • The new minimum number of stamina points of the unit is equal to 0.
            new.getMinStaminaPoints() == 0
      • The default behavior of the unit is equal to the given value for default behavior.
            new.isDefaultBehaviorEnabled() == enableDefaultBehavior
        • Throws:
        IllegalPositionException(position, - [CAN] this) The unit cannot have the given position (out of bounds).
            ! isValidPosition(position)
        IllegalNameException(name, - [CAN] this) The unit cannot have the given name.
            ! isValidName(name)
        IllegalPositionException
        IllegalNameException

        Postcondition:

            new.getName() == newName

public void setWeight(int newValue)

        Parameters:
        newValue - The new weight for this unit.
        Postcondition:
        if the given weight is valid for this unit, the new weight will be equal to the given weight.
            if (canHaveAsWeight(newValue))
            then new.getWeight() == newValue

public void setToughness(int newValue)

        Parameters:
        newValue - The new toughness for this unit.
        Postcondition:
        if the given toughness is valid, then the new toughness will be equal to the given toughness.
            if (isInteger(newValue))
            then new.getToughness() == newValue

      • getMaxHitPoints

        @Raw
public int getMaxHitPoints()
        Return the units maximum number of hitpoints.
        Returns:
        The maximum no. of hitpoints of the unit, which is equal to 200 times the product of the weight divided by 100 and the toughness divided by 100, rounded up to the next integer.
            result = Math.ceil(200*(getWeight()/100.0)*
             (getToughness()/100.0));

      • getCurrentHitPoints

        @Basic
@Raw
public int getCurrentHitPoints()
        Return the units current number of hitpoints.

      • updateCurrentHitPoints

        @Raw
public void updateCurrentHitPoints(int newValue)
        Update the current number of hitpoints of the unit.
        Parameters:
        newValue - The new value for the current no. of hitpoints of the unit.
        Precondition:
        the given new value must be a valid hitpoints value for this unit.
            canHaveAsHitPoints(newValue)
        Postcondition:
        The new no. of hitpoints of the unit is equal to the given new value.
            new.getCurrentHitPoints() == newValue

      • getMaxStaminaPoints

        @Raw
public int getMaxStaminaPoints()
        Return the units maximum number of stamina points.
        Returns:
        The maximum no. of stamina points of the unit, which is equal to 200 times the product of the weight divided by 100 and the toughness divided by 100, rounded up to the next integer.
            result = Math.ceil(200*(getWeight()/100.0)*
             (getToughness()/100.0));

      • getCurrentStaminaPoints

        @Basic
@Raw
public int getCurrentStaminaPoints()

      • updateCurrentStaminaPoints

        @Raw
public void updateCurrentStaminaPoints(int newValue)
        Update the current number of stamina points of the unit.
        Parameters:
        newValue - The new value for the current no. of stamina points of the unit.
        Precondition:
        the given new value must be a valid stamina points value for this unit.
            canHaveAsStaminaPoints(newValue)
        Postcondition:
        The new no. of stamina points of the unit is equal to the given new value.
            new.getCurrentStaminaPoints() == newValue;

      • advanceTime

        public void advanceTime(double dt)
                 throws IllegalPositionException,
                        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                        IllegalTimeException
        Advance the game time and manage activities of the unit.
        Parameters:
        dt - The amount by which the game time has to be advanced
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] The value for dt is not valid.
            ! isValidDT(dt)
        IllegalPositionException

      • isMoving

        public boolean isMoving()
        Returns true if the unit is moving.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the unit is moving.
            result = (getState() == State.MOVING)

      • moveToAdjacent

        public void moveToAdjacent(int... cubeDirection)
                    throws IllegalPositionException,
                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Move to an adjacent cube.
        Parameters:
        cubeDirection - The relative directions of the cube to which the unit has to move.
        Postconditions:
      • The destination of the unit is set to the right adjacent cube, if the unit is not already moving or in the initial resting state or attacked.
            new.getDestination() == determineCube(cubeDirection)
      • The moving direction of the unit is set towards the destination cube, if the unit is not already moving or in the initial resting state or attacked.
            new.movingDirection == new.getDestination() - this.getPosition()
      • The orientation of the unit is set towards the destination, if the unit is not already moving or in the initial resting state or attacked.
            new.getOrientation() == Math.atan2(getVelocity()[0], getVelocity()[2] )
        • Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] The given direction is not a valid direction.
            !(cubeDirection instanceof int[]) || cubeDirection.length != 3 )
        IllegalPositionException

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(int[] destCube)
            throws IllegalPositionException,
                   java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Move to a target cube.
        Parameters:
        destCube - The coordinates of the destination cube.
        Postcondition:
        The long term destination of the unit will be equal to the destination cube.
            new.destCubeLT == destCube
        Throws:
        IllegalPositionException - [CAN] The given destination cube is not valid.
            !isValidPosition(convertPositionToDouble(destCube))
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getDestination

        @Basic
@Model
public double[] getDestination()
        Returns the destination of the unit.

      • getDestCubeLT

        @Basic
public int[] getDestCubeLT()
        Returns the long term destination of the unit.

      • getCurrentSpeed

        public double getCurrentSpeed()
        Returns the units movement speed, which depends on the base speed, the moving direction and on whether the unit is currently moving or not.
        Returns:
        The units speed if the unit is not moving, which is equal to zero.
            result = 0
        Returns:
        The units speed speed if the unit is moving upwards, which is equal to half of the base speed.
            result = 0.5*getBaseSpeed()
        Returns:
        The units speed speed if the unit is moving downwards, which is equal to 1.2 times the base speed.
            result = 1.2*getBaseSpeed()
        Returns:
        The units speed speed if the units z coordinate is not changing while moving, which is equal to the base speed.
            result = getBaseSpeed()

      • isSprinting

        @Basic
public boolean isSprinting()
        Returns whether the unit is sprinting or not.

      • startSprinting

        public void startSprinting()
        Makes the unit start sprinting.
        Postcondition:
        If the unit is moving and if it has enough stamina points, its sprinting field is set to true.
            new.isSprinting() == true

      • stopSprinting

        public void stopSprinting()
        Makes the unit stop sprinting.
        Postcondition:
        The units sprinting field is set to false.
            new.isSprinting() == false

      • isAttacking

        public boolean isAttacking()
        Returns true if the unit is attacking.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the unit is attacking.

      • attack

        public void attack(Unit defender)
            throws IllegalTimeException,
                   IllegalVictimException
        Attack another unit.
        Parameters:
        defender - The unit to attack.
        Postconditions:
      • If the unit is not currently moving, its orientation is set towards the attacked unit.
            new.getOrientation() == arctangent(defender.getPosition()[1]-this.getPosition()[1],
             defender.getPosition()[0]-this.getPosition()[0]))
      • If the unit is not currently moving, the attacked units orientation is set towards this unit, i.e. the attacking unit.
            (new defender).getOrientation() == arctangent(this.getPosition()[1]-
             defender.getPosition()[1], this.getPosition()[0]-defender.getPosition()[0]))
      • If the unit is not currently moving, this units defender field is set to the unit object it is attacking.
            new.defender == defender
        • Throws:
        IllegalVictimException - [CAN] The given unit to be attacked is not in range.
            !canAttack(defender)
        IllegalTimeException

      • isAttacked

        @Basic
public boolean isAttacked()
        Returns whether the unit is currently being attacked.

      • isResting

        public boolean isResting()
        Returns true if the unit is resting.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the unit is resting.
            result = (getState() == State.RESTING_HP || getState() == State.RESTING_STAM
             || getState() == State.RESTING_1)

      • rest

        public void rest()
          throws IllegalTimeException
        Make the unit rest, if it's not currently moving.
        Throws:
        IllegalTimeException

      • isDefaultBehaviorEnabled

        @Basic
public boolean isDefaultBehaviorEnabled()
        Returns whether the default behavior of the unit is enabled.

      • setDefaultBehaviorEnabled

        public void setDefaultBehaviorEnabled(boolean value)
        Set the default behavior of the unit.
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for default behavior.
        Postconditions:
      • If the value is true and the default behavior is not enabled, the default behavior is set to true, hence enabled.
            new.isDefaultBehaviorEnabled() == true
      • If the value is false and the default behavior is enabled, the default behavior is set to false, hence disabled.
            new.isDefaultBehaviorEnabled() == false

      • startDefaultBehavior

        public void startDefaultBehavior()
        Start the default behavior of the unit.
        Postcondition:
        The default behavior of the unit is enabled.
            new.isDefaultBehaviorEnabled() == true

      • stopDefaultBehavior

        public void stopDefaultBehavior()
        Stop the default behavior of the unit.
        Postcondition:
        The default behavior of the unit is disabled.
            new.isDefaultBehaviorEnabled() == false

      • getState

        @Basic
@Raw
public State getState()
        Returns the current state of the unit.

      • setState

        @Raw
public void setState(State state)
        Sets the current state of the unit.
        Parameters:
        state - The state to set the state of the unit to.
        Postcondition:
        The state of the unit is set to the given state.
            new.getState() == state
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] the given state value is not a valid state for the unit.
            !State.contains(toString(state))
